TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MsmqTransportBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqBindingElementBase
Public NotInheritable Class MsmqTransportBindingElement Inherits MsmqBindingElementBase

summary.span: 表示绑定元素，该绑定元素用于为使用本机消息队列 (MSMQ) 协议的 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服务指定队列通信属性。

span.span: Represents the binding element used to specify the queuing communication properties for a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service that uses the native Message Queuing (MSMQ) protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 ，用户可以设置排队信道的属性。The enables the user to set the properties of the queued communication channel. 排队信道使用消息队列进行传输。The queued communication channel uses Message Queuing for its transport. 此绑定元素是消息队列标准绑定 () 所用的默认绑定元素。This binding element is the default binding element used by the Message Queuing standard binding (). ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ImperativeNetMsmq#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_imperativenetmsmq/cs/service.cs#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: public MsmqTransportBindingElement ();

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory<TChannel> BuildChannelFactory<TChannel> (System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext context);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory`1<!!TChannel> BuildChannelFactory<TChannel>(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext context) cil managed
Public Overrides Function BuildChannelFactory(Of TChannel) (context As BindingContext) As IChannelFactory(Of TChannel)
override this.BuildChannelFactory : System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext -> System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory<'Channel>

span.span: A or a class.
The with which to build the channel factory.

summary.span: 使用提供的上下文生成通道工厂。

span.span: Builds a channel factory using the context provided.

returns.span: 一个消息队列 (MSMQ) 通道工厂，用于创建可向现有消息队列应用程序发送消息的通道。

span.span: A Message Queuing (MSMQ) channel factory that can be used to create channels to send messages to existing Message Queuing applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道工厂是使用绑定元素中设置的属性创建并初始化的。A channel factory is created and initialized using the properties that have been set in the binding element. 然后，已初始化的通道工厂用于创建输出通道，这些通道可用于向消息队列发送消息。The initialized channel factory is then used to create output channels that can be used to send messages to a message queue. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ImperativeNetMsmq#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_imperativenetmsmq/cs/snippets.cs#7)]

span.span: The context value is null.

exception.span: TChannel 不为 IOutputChannel 或 IOutputSessionChannel。

span.span: The TChannel is not IOutputChannel or IOutputSessionChannel.

exception.span: MsmqTransportSecurity.MsmqProtectionLevel 为 EncryptAndSign，而 UseActiveDirectory 为 false。

span.span: MsmqTransportSecurity.MsmqProtectionLevel is EncryptAndSign and UseActiveDirectory is false.

MemberSignature.Value: public int MaxPoolSize { get; set; }
.property instance int32 MaxPoolSize
Public Property MaxPoolSize As Integer
public: property int MaxPoolSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxPoolSize : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个整数，该整数指定包含内部消息队列 (MSMQ) 消息对象的池的最大大小。

span.span: Gets or sets an integer that specifies the maximum size of the pool that contains internal Message Queuing (MSMQ) message objects.

value.span: 一个整数，它指定包含内部消息队列消息对象的池的最大大小。

span.span: An integer that specifies the maximum size of the pool that contains internal Message Queuing message objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内部消息队列消息对象池用于在发送和接收消息时避免分配这些对象。The internal Message Queuing message object pool is used to avoid allocations of these objects when sending and receiving messages. 最大池大小是一个性能优化参数。The maximum pool size is a performance-tuning parameter. 默认值为 8。The default value is 8. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ImperativeNetMsmq#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_imperativenetmsmq/cs/snippets.cs#2)]

span.span: The value is less than zero.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个枚举值，该值指示此绑定使用的排队信道传输。

span.span: Gets or sets an enumeration value that indicates the queued communication channel transport that this binding uses.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值指示在队列管理器之间用于消息传递的传输。

span.span: A enumeration value that indicates the transport used for message delivery between queue managers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 SOAP 可靠消息传递协议 (SRMP) 时，消息队列 (MSMQ) 不支持 Active Directory 寻址，因此当 设置为 时，不要将 设置为 或 `true`。Message Queuing (MSMQ) does not support Active Directory addressing when using SOAP Reliable Messaging Protocol (SRMP), so do not set to or when is set to `true`. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ImperativeNetMsmq#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_imperativenetmsmq/cs/snippets.cs#3)]

span.span: The value is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Scheme { get; }
.property instance string Scheme
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Scheme As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Scheme { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.Scheme : string

summary.span: 返回一个 ，它包含此传输绑定元素所用的寻址方案。

span.span: Returns a that contains the addressing scheme that is used by this transport binding element.

value.span: 一个 ，它包含此传输绑定元素所用的寻址方案。

span.span: A that contains the addressing scheme that is used by this transport binding element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回字符串“net.msmq”。The property returns the string "net.msmq". 消息队列 (MSMQ) 排队传输支持多种寻址方案，包括 net.msmq。The Message Queuing (MSMQ) queued transport supports several addressing schemes, including net.msmq. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ImperativeNetMsmq#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_imperativenetmsmq/cs/snippets.cs#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public bool UseActiveDirectory { get; set; }
.property instance bool UseActiveDirectory
Public Property UseActiveDirectory As Boolean
public: property bool UseActiveDirectory { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseActiveDirectory : bool with get, set

summary.span: 返回一个布尔值，该值指示是否应该使用 Active Directory 来转换队列地址。

span.span: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether queue addresses should be converted using Active Directory.

value.span: 如果应该使用 Active Directory 转换队列地址，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if queue addresses should be converted using Active Directory; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列 (MSMQ) 队列地址可由路径名或直接格式名组成。Message Queuing (MSMQ) queue addresses can consist of path names or direct format names. 对于直接格式名，MSMQ 会使用 DNS、NetBIOS 或 IP 解析队列名。With a direct format name, MSMQ resolves the queue name using DNS, NetBIOS, or IP. 对于路径名，MSMQ 会使用 Active Directory 解析队列名。With a path name, MSMQ resolves the queue name using Active Directory. 默认情况下，Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 排队传输将转换为直接格式名消息队列的 URI。By default, the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) queued transport converts the URI of a message queue to a direct format name. 通过将 属性设置为 `true`，应用程序可以指定排队传输应使用 Active Directory 而不是 DNS、NetBIOS 或 IP 解析计算机名称。By setting the property to `true`, an application can specify that the queued transport should resolve the computer name using Active Directory rather than DNS, NetBIOS, or IP. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ImperativeNetMsmq#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_imperativenetmsmq/cs/snippets.cs#5)]
